pages.text: Runic Pendants are powerful pieces of equipment that can be used for a permanent buff.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Healing Pendant, which can give you regeneration.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Speed Pendant, which can give you swiftness.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Strength Pendant, which can give you strength.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Wisdom Pendant, which can give you better deals.
